articles.title: USMNT Costa Rica preview: World Cup berth is at hand - The Washington Post
articles.description: Only an unfathomably awful result will keep the United States out of the World Cup again, but the Americans want a win in Costa Rica.
articles.content: On Tuesday, no one in the U.S. delegation was speaking as though the team had qualified even after a QUALIFIED banner inadvertently was handed to the players to parade around the stadium Sunday night… [+3248 chars]

articles.author: Lola Fadulu
articles.title: Long Covid May Become a Crisis for Black Americans, Experts Say - The New York Times
articles.description: Many of the factors that led to higher rates of infection, hospitalization and death among Black Americans will likely lead to an over-prevalence of long Covid symptoms too, a new report found.
articles.content: Black Americans were overrepresented in essential-worker positions, which increased the risk of exposure to the virus, the authors write. And they were also more likely than white Americans to live i… [+1531 chars]
